item.title: Reflections: Blurring the Boundaries and Shaping the Agenda
item.description: Earnest, David C., Louis W. Pauly, James N. Rosenau, Thomas C. Lawton, Amy C. Verdun. “Reflections: Blurring the Boundaries and Shaping the Agenda.” In Strange Power: Shaping the Parameters of International Relations and International Political Economy, edited by Thomas Lawton, James Rosenau, Amy C. Verdun, 409-420. London: Routledge, 2000. Keywords: Theory Text access (external link)
